NFL coaches

Ronald Eugene Rivera is an American football coach and former player who is the former head coach of the Carolina Panthers of the National Football League. He has also been the defensive coordinator for the Chicago Bears and San Diego Chargers.
Born:
January 7, 1962 (age 57 years), Fort Ord National Monument, CA
Nationality:
American
Quarterback sacks:
Spouse:
Stephanie Rivera (m. 1984)
Past teams coached:
Los Angeles Chargers (Defensive coordinator, 2008–2010), More
Children:
Courtney, Christopher

2011When he was hired as coach of the Carolina Panthers in 2011, Rivera became only the third Latino to become a head coach in the NFL.NFL ‑ Ron Rivera was a Hispanic pioneer as both ...Espn.com

1984An All-America linebacker at Cal, Rivera became one of the pioneering Hispanic players in the NFL when he was drafted by Chicago in 1984.Panthers Coach Ron Rivera credits Hispanic roots, military ...Foxnews.com

1985After Rivera's nine-year playing career with the Chicago Bears, including a starting role on the championship team of 1985, he became an entry-level coach with the Bears for two years.What Super Bowl Coach Ron Rivera Learned From His ...Inc.com

2013After his first taste of success with the Carolina Panthers in 2013, coach Ron Rivera was seemingly on the verge of being fired just one year later.Can Ron Rivera reverse his Carolina Panthers history?Catcrave.com
1997Rivera gained his first coaching experience with the Bears as defensive quality control coach from 1997 98.Ron Rivera ‑ Biography ‑ IMDbImdb.com

2006Rivera was the defensive coordinator for the 2006 Chicago Bears, who won the National Football Conference championship and competed in Super Bowl XLI. He was the defensive coordinator for the San Diego Chargers prior to being named coach of the Panthers.Ron Rivera News | Photos | Quotes | Wiki ‑ UPI.comUpi.com
2016On February 7, 2016, Rivera coached the Panthers in Super Bowl 50. The Panthers fell to the Denver Broncos by a score of 24--10.Ron Rivera ‑ WikipediaWikipedia.org

1962Rivera, whose father is of Puerto Rican descent and mother of Mexican heritage, was born in 1962 in Fort Ord while his father was in the Army.Marina’s Ron Rivera: Growing up to be a Super Bowl coachMontereyherald.com
1983As a senior in 1983, he set the Bears single-season record for sacks with 13 and tackles for loss with 26.5.Ron Rivera ‑ Carolina Panthers NFL Head Coach ‑ Hood ...Hoodhargettbreakfastclub.com

1992In 1992, Rivera retired from playing professional football. For four years, he covered the Chicago Bears and college football as a television analyst for WGN and SportsChannel Chicago.Ron Rivera on the military 'way of life' | The American LegionLegion.org

2008He coached inside linebackers before taking over as the team's defensive coordinator midway through the 2008 season. Under Rivera's guidance, the pass defense steadied itself -- intercepting nine passes and yielding 229.6 passing yards per game and 11 touchdown passes over the final eight games.Ron RiveraPanthers.com
